// Pivot 0, 0
int CLL_3[18] = {
	7, 2,
	14, 2,
	19, 8,
	19, 38,
	14, 43,
	7, 43,
	2, 39,
	1, 8,
	7, 2
};

// Pivot 0.000000, 0.000000
float CLL_3[18] = {
	0.350000f, 0.043478f,
	0.700000f, 0.043478f,
	0.950000f, 0.173913f,
	0.950000f, 0.826087f,
	0.700000f, 0.934783f,
	0.350000f, 0.934783f,
	0.100000f, 0.847826f,
	0.050000f, 0.173913f,
	0.350000f, 0.043478f
